title: Elven boots/zh-CN
data:
**NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！**  
[了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki:How_to_help/zh-CN "NetHackWiki:How to help/zh-CN")

**[English](/wiki/Elven_boots "Elven boots")**

 • [한국어](/wiki/Elven_boots/ko "Elven boots/ko")

 • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| \[   [![Combat boots.png](/images/1/15/Combat_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Combat_boots.png) [![Jungle boots.png](/images/f/fc/Jungle_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Jungle_boots.png) [![Hiking boots.png](/images/b/bc/Hiking_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Hiking_boots.png) [![Mud boots.png](/images/d/de/Mud_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Mud_boots.png) [![Buckled boots.png](/images/5/59/Buckled_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Buckled_boots.png) [![Riding boots.png](/images/4/42/Riding_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Riding_boots.png) [![Snow boots.png](/images/f/fe/Snow_boots.png)](/wiki/File:Snow_boots.png)***精灵靴 |                                                                                                                  |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 外观                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | [随机](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "随机外观 (page does not exist)") |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                  |
| 装备槽位                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | [靴子](/wiki/%E9%9D%B4%E5%AD%90 "靴子")                                                                              |
| AC                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | [1](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%A4%E7%94%B2%E7%AD%89%E7%BA%A7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "护甲等级 (page does not exist)")  |
| 特殊效果                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | - [潜行](/index.php?title=%E6%BD%9C%E8%A1%8C\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "潜行 (page does not exist)")                   |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              |                                                                                                                  |
| 基础价                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | 8 [zm](/wiki/%E9%87%91%E5%B8%81 "金币")                                                                            |
| 重量                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | [15](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)")                     |
| 材料                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           | [皮革](/index.php?title=%E7%9A%AE%E9%9D%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "皮革 (page does not exist)")                     |

**精灵靴**（elven boots）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[靴子](/wiki/%E9%9D%B4%E5%AD%90 "靴子")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它是一种[魔法](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法物品 (page does not exist)")防具，由[皮革](/index.php?title=%E7%9A%AE%E9%9D%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "皮革 (page does not exist)")制成，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观是[随机](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "随机外观 (page does not exist)")的[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 消息](#.E6.B6.88.E6.81.AF)

- [6 Variants](#Variants)

  - [6.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [6.2 UnNetHack](#UnNetHack)
  - [6.3 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [6.4 EvilHack](#EvilHack)
  - [6.5 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)
  - [6.6 Hack'EM](#Hack.27EM)

- [7 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[精灵](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%EF%BC%88%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%A7%8D%E6%97%8F%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵（起始种族） (page does not exist)")族的角色在游戏开始时即鉴定精灵靴[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

非[亡灵](/index.php?title=%E4%BA%A1%E7%81%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "亡灵 (page does not exist)")的[精灵](/index.php?title=%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%EF%BC%88%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E5%B1%9E%E6%80%A7%EF%BC%89\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "精灵（怪物属性） (page does not exist)")族怪物在生成时若未获得[精灵皮帽](/wiki/%E7%B2%BE%E7%81%B5%E7%9A%AE%E5%B8%BD "精灵皮帽")，则有1⁄4的概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")精灵靴[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)。

在[星界位面](/index.php?title=%E6%98%9F%E7%95%8C%E4%BD%8D%E9%9D%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "星界位面 (page does not exist)")生成的[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")有约8.01%的概率[携带](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")精灵靴[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)。

## 描述

精灵靴的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为1，穿戴时赋予[潜行](/index.php?title=%E6%BD%9C%E8%A1%8C\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "潜行 (page does not exist)")特质。若玩家不具有其他来源的潜行特质，穿戴或脱下精灵靴会[自动鉴定](/index.php?title=%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "自动鉴定 (page does not exist)")之。

## 策略

- *主条目：[潜行](/index.php?title=%E6%BD%9C%E8%A1%8C\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "潜行 (page does not exist)")*

精灵靴在玩家探索[仓库番](/index.php?title=%E4%BB%93%E5%BA%93%E7%95%AA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "仓库番 (page does not exist)")的动物园或其他有大量沉睡的怪物聚集的[特殊房间](/index.php?title=%E7%89%B9%E6%AE%8A%E6%88%BF%E9%97%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "特殊房间 (page does not exist)")时很有用。

精灵靴是最轻便且最常见的魔法防具之一，且可以安全附魔到+7，因此非常适合于[批量变形](/index.php?title=%E6%89%B9%E9%87%8F%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "批量变形 (page does not exist)")。

## 历史

精灵靴最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## 消息

- 你走得非常安静。（You walk very quietly.）

  你在不具有潜行的情况下穿上精灵靴（靴子会自动鉴定）。

- 你当然有噪音。（You sure are noisy.）

  你在不具有其他潜行来源的情况下脱下精灵靴（靴子会自动鉴定）。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Elven_boots/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Some variants may give elves (including elven player characters) an AC bonus for wearing elven boots.

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), a pair of elven boots is generated in [The Rat King's](/wiki/The_Rat_King_\(SLASH%27EM\) "The Rat King (SLASH'EM)") room on the [rat level](/wiki/Rat_level "Rat level").

### UnNetHack

In [UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack"), elven boots grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven characters.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack"), elven boots grant 1 AC, 0 [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and stealth while worn. Their base [material](/wiki/Object_materials_\(dNetHack\) "Object materials (dNetHack)") is changed to [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood"), and they weigh 10 [aum](/wiki/Aum "Aum").

[Orion](/wiki/Orion "Orion") always generates with blessed +5 elven boots.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), elven boots grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven characters.

[Elven wizards](/wiki/Elven_wizard "Elven wizard") have a 1⁄4 chance of being generated with elven boots like other non-undead elves.

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, the alternate sewer map for the rat level places the elven boots directly on The Rat King's square.

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), elven boots grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven characters.

[Upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") elven boots will produce [fumble boots](/wiki/Fumble_boots "Fumble boots"), and vice versa.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/objects.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 514](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/objects.c#L514)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 831](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L831)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 228](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L228)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 134](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L134)
5. [↑](#cite_ref-5) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 294](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L294)

[![此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。")
html:
Elven boots/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< Elven boots
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 한국어

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
[         
精灵靴
外观 随机
装备槽位 靴子
AC 1
特殊效果
  • 潜行
基础价 8 zm
重量 15
材料 皮革

精灵靴（elven boots）是NetHack中的一种靴子类防具。它是一种魔法防具，由皮革制成，未鉴定时外观是随机的[1]。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
  • 3 策略
  • 4 历史
  • 5 消息
  • 6 Variants
    • 6.1 SLASH'EM
    • 6.2 UnNetHack
    • 6.3 dNetHack
    • 6.4 EvilHack
    • 6.5 SlashTHEM
    • 6.6 Hack'EM
  • 7 引用及注释

生成

精灵族的角色在游戏开始时即鉴定精灵靴[2]。

非亡灵的精灵族怪物在生成时若未获得精灵皮帽，则有1⁄4的概率获得精灵靴[3]。

在星界位面生成的玩家怪物有约8.01%的概率携带精灵靴[4][5]。

描述

精灵靴的基础AC加成为1，穿戴时赋予潜行特质。若玩家不具有其他来源的潜行特质，穿戴或脱下精灵靴会自动鉴定之。

策略

主条目：潜行

精灵靴在玩家探索仓库番的动物园或其他有大量沉睡的怪物聚集的特殊房间时很有用。

精灵靴是最轻便且最常见的魔法防具之一，且可以安全附魔到+7，因此非常适合于批量变形。

历史

精灵靴最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

消息

你走得非常安静。（You walk very quietly.）
你在不具有潜行的情况下穿上精灵靴（靴子会自动鉴定）。
你当然有噪音。（You sure are noisy.）
你在不具有其他潜行来源的情况下脱下精灵靴（靴子会自动鉴定）。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

Some variants may give elves (including elven player characters) an AC bonus for wearing elven boots.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, a pair of elven boots is generated in The Rat King's room on the rat level.

UnNetHack

In UnNetHack, elven boots grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven characters.

dNetHack

In dNetHack, elven boots grant 1 AC, 0 DR and stealth while worn. Their base material is changed to wood, and they weigh 10 aum.

Orion always generates with blessed +5 elven boots.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, elven boots grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven characters.

Elven wizards have a 1⁄4 chance of being generated with elven boots like other non-undead elves.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, in addition to SLASH'EM details, the alternate sewer map for the rat level places the elven boots directly on The Rat King's square.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, elven boots grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven characters.

Upgrading elven boots will produce fumble boots, and vice versa.

引用及注释

  1. ↑ src/objects.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 514
  2. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 831
  3. ↑ src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 228
  4. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 134
  5. ↑ src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 294

  • [[潜行]]
|cost=8 |weight=15 |material=皮革 }} '''精灵靴'''（elven boots）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[靴子]]类[[防具]]。它是一种[[魔法物品|魔法]]防具，由[[皮革]]制成，未[[鉴定]]时外观是[[随机外观|随机]]的{{refsrc|src/objects.c|514|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 生成 == [[精灵（起始种族）|精灵]]族的角色在游戏开始时即鉴定精灵靴{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|831|nethack=3.6.7}}。 非[[亡灵]]的[[精灵（怪物属性）|精灵]]族怪物在生成时若未获得[[精灵皮帽]]，则有{{frac|4}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|获得]]精灵靴{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|228|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 在[[星界位面]]生成的[[玩家怪物]]有约8.01%的概率[[怪物起始物品|携带]]精灵靴{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|134|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|294|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 描述 == 精灵靴的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为1，穿戴时赋予[[潜行]]特质。若玩家不具有其他来源的潜行特质，穿戴或脱下精灵靴会[[自动鉴定]]之。 == 策略 == {{main/zh-CN|潜行}} 精灵靴在玩家探索[[仓库番]]的动物园或其他有大量沉睡的怪物聚集的[[特殊房间]]时很有用。 精灵靴是最轻便且最常见的魔法防具之一，且可以安全附魔到+7，因此非常适合于[[批量变形]]。 == 历史 == 精灵靴最初于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏。 == 消息 == {{message/zh-CN|你走得非常安静。|你在不具有潜行的情况下穿上精灵靴（靴子会自动鉴定）。|You walk very quietly.}} {{message/zh-CN|你当然有噪音。|你在不具有其他潜行来源的情况下脱下精灵靴（靴子会自动鉴定）。|You sure are noisy.}} ==Variants== {{translation/zh-CN|n}} Some variants may give elves (including elven player characters) an AC bonus for wearing elven boots. ===SLASH'EM=== In [[SLASH'EM]], a pair of elven boots is generated in [[The Rat King (SLASH'EM)|The Rat King's]] room on the [[rat level]]. ===UnNetHack=== In [[UnNetHack]], elven boots grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven characters. ===dNetHack=== In [[dNetHack]], elven boots grant 1 AC, 0 [[DR]] and stealth while worn. Their base [[Object materials (dNetHack)|material]] is changed to [[wood]], and they weigh 10 [[aum]]. [[Orion]] always generates with blessed +5 elven boots. ===EvilHack=== In [[EvilHack]], elven boots grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven characters. [[Elven wizard]]s have a {{frac|4}} chance of being generated with elven boots like other non-undead elves. ===SlashTHEM=== In [[SlashTHEM]], in addition to SLASH'EM details, the alternate sewer map for the rat level places the elven boots directly on The Rat King's square. ===Hack'EM=== In [[Hack'EM]], elven boots grant +1 AC to elven monsters that wear them, including elven characters. [[Upgrading]] elven boots will produce [[fumble boots]], and vice versa. == 引用及注释 == {{nethack-367/zh-CN}} [[Category:Boots/zh-CN|JINGLINGXUE]] [[Category:Elven items/zh-CN|XUE]]
